citation: Proclamation under the Local Government (Consequential Amendments) Act 2005 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Local Government (Consequential Amendments) Act 2005

I, the Administrator in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Local Government (Consequential Amendments) Act 2005 fix 1 July 2005 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

22 June 2005

E. C. CRAWFORD

Administrator

By His Excellency's Command,

J. G. COX

Minister Assisting the Premier on Local Government

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 June 2005

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
